name: TerraformTask
description: Execute terraform commands to provision resources on AzureRM, AWS and GCP
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: provider
inputs.label: Provider
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The name of the provider used in the terraform configuration files.
Only one provider must be specified.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Configuration Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the Terraform configuration files. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: commandOptions
inputs.label: Additional Command Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Any additional arguments for the selected command such as '-option=value' or '-flag'. Multiple options can also be provided delimited by spaces.

Examples:
-out=tfplan (for terraform plan)
tfplan -auto-approve (for terraform apply)

inputs.name: environmentServiceNameAzureRM
inputs.label: Azure Environment Subscription
inputs.visibleRule: provider = azurerm && command != init && command != validate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: environmentServiceNameAWS
inputs.label: AWS Environment Subscription
inputs.visibleRule: provider = aws && command != init && command != validate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an AWS subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: environmentServiceNameGCP
inputs.label: GCP Environment Subscription
inputs.visibleRule: provider = gcp && command != init && command != validate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a GCP subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: backendServiceArm
inputs.label: Azure Backend Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure resource manager subscription for the terraform backend configuration

inputs.name: backendAzureRmResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The resource group which contains the storage account.

inputs.name: backendAzureRmStorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage Account Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the storage account.

inputs.name: backendAzureRmContainerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the container to use within the storage account.

inputs.name: backendAzureRmKey
inputs.label: Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The key where to place/look for state file inside the container

inputs.name: backendServiceAWS
inputs.label: AWS Backend Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: AWS subscription for the terraform backend configuration

inputs.name: backendAWSBucketName
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the S3 bucket for storing the state file.

inputs.name: backendAWSKey
inputs.label: Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the state file inside the S3 bucket

inputs.name: backendAWSRegion
inputs.label: Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The region of the S3 bucket

inputs.name: backendServiceGCP
inputs.label: GCP Backend Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: GCP subscription for the terraform backend configuration

inputs.name: backendGCPBucketName
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the GCP storage bucket for storing the state file

inputs.name: backendGCPPrefix
inputs.label: Prefix of state file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GCS prefix inside the bucket. The states are stored in an object called <prefix>/<name>.tfstate

messages.TerraformToolNotFound: Failed to find terraform tool in paths
